rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I was so surprised when my
older brother became a Driver.

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Once you become a Driver, you
have to go to the Superbian
Empire's capital right away...

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0003
rows.name:
It's a little lonely, but
I gave him some solid
advice and saw him off.

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I told him that when fighting,
it's better for the Driver
and Blade to stay close.

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0005
rows.name:
It makes it easier to deepen
your Kizuna, apparently.

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0006
rows.name:
And when your Kizuna
deepens, both the Driver
and the Blade get stronger.

rows.label: tlk41200151_01_msg0007
rows.name:
It wouldn't hurt for you
to remember that, either.
